docs.lead_paragraph: A sport that traditionally does not allow player substitutions ponders growing concerns over concussions, and whether to change its rules.

headline.print_headline: Effort to Address Concussions in Cricket Is Met With Resistance
headline.main: Allowing Substitutes After Head Injuries in Cricket Meets Resistance

docs.snippet: A sport that traditionally does not allow player substitutions ponders growing concerns over concussions, and whether to change its rules....

docs.lead_paragraph: Kayla Goth scored a career-high 25, Eternati Willock had a double-double and No. 24 Kansas State made all 12 of its free throws in the last 1:11 to defeat Iowa State 74-67 in the Big 12 tournament quarterfinals on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Goth Leads No. 24 K-State Past Iowa State 74-67 in Big 12
headline.main: Goth Leads No. 24 K-State Past Iowa State 74-67 in Big 12

docs.snippet: Kayla Goth scored a career-high 25, Eternati Willock had a double-double and No. 24 Kansas State made all 12 of its free throws in the last 1:11 to defeat Iowa State 74-67 in the Big 12 tournament quarterfinals on Saturday....

docs.lead_paragraph: The Syrian army has expanded its control over former Islamic State-held villages in northwest Syria, gaining more territory as it pushes back the jihadists from more pockets in Aleppo province, state media said on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Syrian Army Takes More Villages From Militants in Northwest Syria
headline.main: Syrian Army Takes More Villages From Militants in Northwest Syria

docs.snippet: The Syrian army has expanded its control over former Islamic State-held villages in northwest Syria, gaining more territory as it pushes back the jihadists from more pockets in Aleppo province, state media said on Saturday....

docs.lead_paragraph: An Italian official says that the autopsy on the chief suspect in the Berlin Christmas market attack indicated frequent drug use.

headline.print_headline: Official: Berlin Truck Attacker Autopsy Indicates Drug Use
headline.main: Official: Berlin Truck Attacker Autopsy Indicates Drug Use

docs.snippet: An Italian official says that the autopsy on the chief suspect in the Berlin Christmas market attack indicated frequent drug use....

docs.lead_paragraph: With most of her teammates in foul trouble, Marina Mabrey took over to get Notre Dame back to the ACC Tournament finals.

headline.print_headline: Notre Dame Heads to ACC Final for 4th Straight Year
headline.main: Notre Dame Heads to ACC Final for 4th Straight Year

docs.lead_paragraph: A Washington state man has been sentenced to 20 years in prison for killing an Oregon man he mistakenly believed impregnated a 13-year-old girl.

headline.print_headline: 20-Year Sentence for Mistaken Washington State Honor Killing
headline.main: 20-Year Sentence for Mistaken Washington State Honor Killing

docs.snippet: A Washington state man has been sentenced to 20 years in prison for killing an Oregon man he mistakenly believed impregnated a 13-year-old girl....

docs.lead_paragraph: The International Monetary Fund said on Saturday it had reached an agreement with Ukraine on an updated memorandum under a $17.5 billion program, paving the way for its board to consider the disbursement of the fourth loan tranche later in March.

headline.print_headline: IMF Reaches Deal With Ukraine Paving Way for Next Loan Disbursal
headline.main: IMF Reaches Deal With Ukraine Paving Way for Next Loan Disbursal

docs.snippet: The International Monetary Fund said on Saturday it had reached an agreement with Ukraine on an updated memorandum under a $17.5 billion program, paving the way for its board to consider the disbursement of the fourth loan tranche later in March....

docs.lead_paragraph: Virginia coach Tony Bennett waited after No. 23 Virginia's 67-42 victory against Pittsburgh was over, and then waited again until London Perrantes had finished a postgame television interview before putting his arm around the point guard and walking off the court.

headline.print_headline: Perrantes Leads No. 23 Virginia Past Pitt, 67-42
headline.main: Perrantes Leads No. 23 Virginia Past Pitt, 67-42

docs.lead_paragraph: The White House budget director confirmed Saturday that the Trump administration will propose "fairly dramatic reductions" in the U.S. foreign aid budget later this month.

headline.print_headline: Trump Administration to Propose 'Dramatic Reductions' in Foreign Aid
headline.main: Trump Administration to Propose 'Dramatic Reductions' in Foreign Aid

docs.snippet: The White House budget director confirmed Saturday that the Trump administration will propose "fairly dramatic reductions" in the U.S. foreign aid budget later this month....

docs.lead_paragraph: A recently unsealed search warrant shows police have suspects in the fatal shooting of a 9-year-old Milwaukee girl last year, but authorities are still seeking evidence to bring charges in her death.

headline.print_headline: Warrant Shows Police Have Suspects in Death of 9-Year-Old
headline.main: Warrant Shows Police Have Suspects in Death of 9-Year-Old

docs.snippet: A recently unsealed search warrant shows police have suspects in the fatal shooting of a 9-year-old Milwaukee girl last year, but authorities are still seeking evidence to bring charges in her death....
